title: Smoothie Maker

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "next" onto one switch and "put it in the blender" onto the other.
• Hold up the ingredients one at a time. If the switch user presses "next," put the current ingredient down and show the next one.
• If the switch user presses "put it in the blender," place the ingredient you are holding into the blender.
• Once the switch user has chosen all their ingredients, connect a wired or wireless switch and the blender to an appliance controller.
• The switch user can then use their switch to blend their smoothie.

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to scan through ingredients. Then use an appliance controller to turn the blender on.
